name: Make Way for Noise
description:
My submission for the GMTK Jam 2020, created in 48 hours by a single developer. 

Descend into a cave devoid of light, and use the noise of your surroundings to guide your way out.  Make noise using your slingshot and take note of the environment, but be wary, somethings in the cave, 

Move using the a/d or arrow keys, jump with spacebar and use your mouse to aim and shoot.
